data.name: Evonik
data.description:
Our purpose is the cornerstone of our performance pledge: “Leading beyond chemistry to improve life, today and tomorrow.” It can be traced back to our company’s roots and describes why we do something, what drives us and the contribution Evonik makes to society over and above generating profits.

At Evonik, we go beyond chemistry to make life a little better day in, day out – a goal we are committed to. We aim to have a direct, positive impact on everyone’s life by enhancing the properties of our customers’ products. Our purpose is hence the driving force behind our strategic decisions, through which we naturally take responsibility for the present and future generations.

data.name: AEROSIL
data.description: Evonik is the inventor of AEROSIL® fumed silica, which is a synthetic fumed silica that is produced by flame hydrolysis. For over 70 years AEROSIL® has proven to enhance performance in many markets and applications. Today Evonik's AEROSIL® portfolio covers a broad range of surface areas, as well as very different surface chemistries. Also, AEROSIL® does not get tired in finding new markets, applications and effects. AEROSIL® is invented to improve.

data.name: HyaCare®
data.description: Hyaluronic acid solutions with superior age-defying and moisturization efficacy.

data.name: VISIOMER
data.description:
VISIOMER® Specialty Methacrylates offer an innovative way to customize product properties for various end use applications.
With a range of alkyl/aryl (meth)acrylates, aminofunctional monomers, methacrylamides, ether methacrylates, crosslinkers, HEMA for contact lenses, wet adhesion monomers and specialty intermediates, VISIOMER® has become a trusted partner in designing customized products to meet specific needs.

data.name: SIPERNAT
data.description: Evonik's SIPERNAT® precipitated silicas are well-known and used as an anti-caking agent, carrier, stabilizer, defoamer, rheology controller, microplastic replacement, and numerous others. The SIPERNAT® product range provides a specialized product solution for many challenges. Through advanced product technology, custom application development and best-in-class handling expertise, Evonik's technical team supports customers in finding the right solution to step up the performance.

data.name: ZEOFREE
data.description: Evonik's ZEOFREE® precipitated silicas are well-known and used as an anti-caking agent, carrier, stabilizer, defoamer, rheology controller, microplastic replacement, and numerous others. The ZEOFREE®product range provides a specialized product solution for many challenges. Through advanced product technology, custom application development and best-in-class handling expertise, Evonik's technical team supports customers in finding the right solution to step up the performance.

data.name: BeautiFerm
data.description: Formulate natural skincare products that leverage the powerful, rejuvenating benefits of fermented beauty actives with BeautiFerm. From restoring a youthful glow to visibly firming skin and boosting its regeneration, these natural, sustainable, and scientifically proven ingredients are ideal additions to creams, lotions, and other anti-aging solutions popular amongst today's skintellectual consumers.

data.name: AEROSIL® 130
data.description: AEROSIL® 130 is a fumed silica with a high specific surface area, making it an excellent thickening and reinforcing agent for a wide range of applications. This product is particularly well-suited for use in adhesives, coatings, and composites, as it can improve mechanical strength and increase the durability of the final product. AEROSIL® 130 is a hydrophilic fumed silica with a specific surface area of 130 m2/g.

data.name: ROHACELL® XT
data.description: ROHACELL® XT is a closed-cell rigid foam based on polymethacrylimide (PMI) chemistry that are free of CFCs and designed to meet the most extreme and demanding processing requirements. ROHACELL® XT foam is compatible with autoclave technologies, vacuum infusion, RTM, and VARTM processes.

data.name: SIPERNAT® 9000 PC
data.description: SIPERNAT® 9000 PC is composed of exceptionally sturdy, round-edged hydrated silica particles and is therefore the preferred choice for formulations with a long-lasting scrubbing effect. The large SIPERNAT® 9000 PC particles are the preferred choice for strong desquamation or as a sensory indicator when combined with smaller particles for cleaning.

data.name: BeautiFerm® Resurf L PG
data.description: BeautiFerm® Resurf L PG is a fermented ingredient carefully selected from lactic acid bacterium (LAB). It strengthens the microbial shield by promoting the growth of beneficial microbes on the skin, driven by probiotic science. This product supports a balanced and healthy skin microbiota. It comes in liquid form and is preserved with pentylene glycol.

data.name: SIPERNAT® 22 PC
data.description: SIPERNAT® 22 PC is an eco-friendly solution. As a silica with particles in the range of 120 um, it is used to replace polyethylene beads in exfoliating skincare formulations such as shower gels and facial cleansers. In addition to its scrubbing effect, its sponge-like structure can also transport liquid ingredients into the cosmetic formulation. Its microbiological quality is guaranteed through regular and stringent monitoring.

data.name: ROHACELL® WF
data.description: ROHACELL® WF is a core material with a coarse cell size that offers exceptional heat resistance and creep compression strength. It is characterized by its high temperature and compressive resistance, making it suitable for various applications, including aircraft, space, automotive, industrial, and radomes.

data.name: SIPERNAT® 50 S
data.description: SIPERNAT® 50 S is a hydrophilic, finely milled silica. Besides its application as flow aid and highly effective anticaking agent it also may serve as carrier of especially high absorptive capacity in case particle fineness is required.

data.name: ROHACELL® A
data.description: ROHACELL® A is a closed-cell rigid foam crafted from polymethacrylimide (PMI) chemistry. Notably, it is entirely devoid of CFCs, aligning with environmental considerations. Engineered with precision, ROHACELL® A foam is tailored to meet the rigorous standards of the aerospace industry. It offers versatility in aerospace applications, supporting both prepreg processing and vacuum infusion across various pressure and temperature ranges.

data.name: SK-Influx® MB
data.description: SK-Influx® is a skin-identical lipid concentrate for enhanced skin moisturization and protection. It is ideal for aging skin, dry skin and sensitive skin. SK-Influx® is a concentrated formulation, consisting of a multi-lamellar (membrane) system resembling the structure of the lipid barrier in the Stratum Corneum. It is a concentrated mix of different types of ceramides, cholesterol, free fatty acids and phytosphingosine makes it an ideal ingredient for personal care products with unique restoring capabilities.

data.seo_description: Our purpose is the cornerstone of our performance pledge: “Leading beyond chemistry to improve life, today and tomorrow.” It can be traced back to our company’s roots and describes why we do something

featured_products.name: BeautiFerm® Lift
featured_products.description: BeautiFerm Lift is derived from a strictly controlled natural fermentation process of a special yeast originally found in the centennial trees of Yosemite National Park (U.S.)

featured_products.description: BeautiFerm Resurf L is a product that utilizes a carefully selected ferment of the lactic acid bacterium (LAB). This fermented ingredient is aqueous and driven by probiotic sc

featured_products.name: HyaCare®
featured_products.description: HyaCare® a biosynthetic, non-animal derived hyaluronic acid is available. HyaCare® is based on a unique production method by fermentation of a novel strain, Bacillus subtilis.

featured_products.name: LACTIL®
featured_products.description: LACTIL® is a blend of humectants in aqueous solution adapting the "Natural Moisturizing Factor"(NMF) of human skin. Especially suitable for use in hydroregulative cosmetics.

featured_products.name: TEGO® Pep 4-17 MB
featured_products.description: TEGO® Pep 4-17 MB is ECM boosting peptide which is a unique, high performing, nature inspired tetrapeptide which boosts ECM proteins to smooth the skin surface and minimize th

featured_products.name: TEGO® RenewHA Mandelic
featured_products.description: TEGO® RenewHA Mandelic is an aromatic alpha hydroxy acid (AHA). Although originally derived from amygdalin, an extract from almonds, most mandelic acid today is synthetically

data.name: Dynasylan
data.seo_description: Knowde is the first marketplace for chemicals, polymers and ingredients. Our leading-edge digital capabilities connect thousands of sellers and buyers every day.

data.name: Dynasylan® 1122
data.description: Dynasylan® 1122 is a secondary aminofunctional ethoxysilane, characterized by two symmetric silicone atoms. It functions as an adhesion promoter between inorganic materials (such as glass, metals, fillers) and organic polymers (including thermosets, thermoplastics, elastomers). In addition to its role as a surface modifier, Dynasylan® 1122 can be employed for the chemical modification of various substances.

data.name: Dynasylan® 1124
data.description: Dynasylan® 1124 is a secondary aminofunctional methoxysilane with symmetric silicon atoms, serves as an adhesion promoter between inorganic materials (like glass, metals, fillers) and organic polymers (thermosets, thermoplastics, elastomers). This versatile compound also functions as a surface modifier and enables chemical substance modification. Available as a colorless to yellow liquid with an amine-like odor, Dynasylan® 1124 readily dissolves in alcohols, aliphatic, or aromatic hydrocarbons.

data.name: Dynasylan® 1146
data.description: Dynasylan® 1146 is a hydrophobic diaminofunctional silane widely utilized in adhesives, sealants, and coatings. It enhances the adhesion of amino-reactive resins (e.g., RTV-silicones, two-part urethanes, silylated urethanes, MS polymers, and two-part epoxies) to inorganic surfaces, plastic surfaces, and inorganic fillers. Characterized by randomly distributed linear and cyclic oligosiloxanes, Dynasylan® 1146 fulfills the OECD polymer definition. Its low volatility and viscosity facilitate compounding, while its minimal by-product (VOC) generation contributes to a reduced odor level during application.

data.name: Dynasylan® 1189
data.description: Dynasylan® 1189 is a bifunctional silane, boasts a reactive secondary amine and hydrolyzable methoxysilyl groups. Its dual reactivity enables chemical binding to both inorganic materials (such as glass, metals, fillers) and organic polymers (like thermosets, thermoplastics, elastomers). Serving as an adhesion promoter, surface modifier, and catalyst for substance modification, Dynasylan® 1189 contributes to versatile applications.

data.name: Dynasylan® 1401
data.description: Dynasylan® 1401 is a bifunctional organosilane, incorporates reactive amino groups and hydrolyzable inorganic methoxysilyl groups. Its dual reactivity facilitates chemical binding to both inorganic materials (e.g., glass, metals, fillers) and organic polymers (including thermosets, thermoplastics, elastomers). This compound functions as an adhesion promoter, surface modifier, and reactant for product modification, offering a multifunctional solution.

data.name: Dynasylan® 1505
data.description: Dynasylan® 1505 is an amino-functional silane which acts as an adhesion promoter between inorganic materials (for example glass, metals and fillers) and organic polymers (thermosets, thermoplastics and elastomers) and as a surface modifier. This liquid product finds its use in coatings, primers, and industrial additives like foundry resins. Compatible with glass and metal substrates, it's your go-to for various applications, from abrasives manufacturing to pipes and cables. Elevate your materials with Dynasylan® 1505.

data.name: Dynasylan® 6490
data.description: Dynasylan® 6490 is a concentrate of vinyl silane (oligomeric siloxane) containing both vinyl and methoxy groups. This nearly odorless, colorless, low-viscosity liquid acts as an excellent compatibilizer between inorganic fillers (such as kaolin, MDH, ATH) and organic polymers (including EPDM, EVA, PE).

data.name: Dynasylan® 6498
data.description: Dynasylan® 6498 is a concentrate of vinyl silane (oligomeric siloxane) containing vinyl and ethoxy groups. This low-viscosity liquid, nearly odorless and colorless, serves as a superb compatibilizer between inorganic fillers (such as kaolin, MDH, ATH) and organic polymers (including EPDM, EVA, PE).

data.name: Dynasylan® 6598
data.description: Dynasylan® 6598 is an oligomeric siloxane featuring vinyl, propyl, and ethoxy groups. Developed from Dynasylan® VTMOEO, this colorless and nearly odorless liquid brings enhanced properties. Acting as an excellent silane compatibilizer, it bridges inorganic fillers like kaolin, MDH, and ATH with organic polymers such as EPDM, EVA, and PE. In mineral-filled and peroxide-crosslinked cable systems, Dynasylan® 6598 improves mechanical and electrical attributes, especially in moist conditions. With its high boiling start and flash point, it ensures safety, handling ease, and processing advantages. Furthermore, this product emits significantly less hydrolysis ethanol (VOC) compared to monomeric silanes, addressing environmental considerations.

data.name: Dynasylan® A

summary.name: Synonyms
items: Ethyl Orthosilicate, Ethyl Silicate, Tetraethoxysilane, Tetraethyl Silicate

data.description: Dynasylan® A is also known as TEOS (tetraethoxysilane), is the ethyl ester of orthosilicic acid. This colorless, low-viscosity liquid boasts a SiO content of 28.5%. Utilization involves acid- or alkali-catalyzed hydrolysis, leveraging all four ethoxy groups for reaction and earning it tetrafunctional status. Hydrolysis initiates silanol group formation, which further condenses to establish robust siloxane bonds (-Si-O-Si-). Notably, condensation begins before hydrolysis concludes, with ongoing condensation during storage resulting in gel formation. Gelation rate hinges on water concentration.

data.name: Dynasylan® AMEO
data.description: Dynasylan® AMEO is a bifunctional silane, encompassing a reactive primary amino group and hydrolyzable ethoxysilyl groups. Its dual reactivity enables Dynasylan® AMEO to establish chemical bonds with both inorganic materials (e.g., glass, metals, fillers) and organic polymers (such as thermosets, thermoplastics, elastomers). It serves as an adhesion promoter, crosslinker, and surface modifier.

data.name: Dynasylan® AMMO
data.description: Dynasylan® AMMO is a bifunctional organosilane, presents a reactive primary amine and hydrolyzable inorganic methoxysilyl groups. Its dual reactivity enables chemical bonding to both inorganic materials (e.g., glass, metals, fillers) and organic polymers (e.g., thermosets, thermoplastics, elastomers). Functioning as an adhesion promoter and surface modifier, Dynasylan® AMMO is a clear, colorless liquid with an amine-like odor. It shows solubility in alcohols and aliphatic and aromatic hydrocarbons.

data.name: Dynasylan® DAMO
data.description: Dynasylan® DAMO is a versatile diamino-functional silane that enhances adhesion and modifies surfaces. Acting as an adhesion promoter and surface modifier, it bridges the gap between inorganic materials and organic polymers like polyamides, PBT, PVC, and more. This silane boasts features like corrosion resistance, good impact strength, and improved mechanical properties. It's your solution for cables, pipes, and beyond. Elevate your materials with Dynasylan® DAMO.

data.name: Dynasylan® DAMO-T
data.description: Dynasylan® DAMO-T is a bifunctional organosilane, equipped with two reactive amino groups and hydrolyzable inorganic methoxysilyl groups. With this dual reactivity, Dynasylan® DAMO-T can establish chemical bonds with both inorganic materials (such as glass, metals, fillers) and organic polymers (including thermosets, thermoplastics, elastomers). This makes it an effective adhesion promoter and surface modifier.

data.name: Dynasylan® GLYEO
data.description: Dynasylan® GLYEO is a bifunctional organosilane, features a reactive organic epoxide and a hydrolyzable inorganic triethoxysilyl group. Its dual reactivity facilitates chemical bonding to both inorganic materials (e.g., glass, metals, fillers) and organic polymers (e.g., thermosets, thermoplastics, elastomers). Serving as an adhesion promoter, crosslinking agent, and surface modifier, Dynasylan® GLYEO is a colorless, low-viscosity liquid with a subtle terpentine-like odor. It readily dissolves in alcohols, ketones, and aliphatic and aromatic hydrocarbons.

data.name: Dynasylan® GLYMO

summary.name: Synonyms
items: (3-Glycidoxypropyl)trimethoxysilane, (γ-Glycidoxypropyl)trimethoxysilane, [[3-(Trimethoxysilyl)propoxy]methyl]oxirane, [3-(2,3-Epoxypropoxy)propyl]trimethoxysilane, [3-(Glycidyloxy)propyl]trimethoxysilane, [γ-(Glycidyloxy)propyl]trimethoxysilane, 1-(Glycidyloxy)-3-(trimethoxysilyl)propane, 2-((3-(Trimethoxysilyl)propyloxy)methyl)oxirane, 2-[[3-(Trimethoxysilyl)propoxy]methyl]oxirane, 3-(Glycidyloxy)propyltrimethoxylsilane, 3-(Trimethoxysilyl)propyl glycidyl ether, Epoxypropoxypropyltrimethoxysilane, Glycidoxypropyltrimethoxysilane, Glycidyl 3-(trimethoxysilyl)propyl ether, Glycidyl γ-(trimethoxysilyl)propyl ether, Glycidyloxypropyltrimethoxysilane, NSC 93590, Trimethoxy-γ-glycidoxypropylsilane, Trimethoxy(3-(oxiran-2-ylmethoxy)propyl)silane, Trimethoxy(3-glycidoxypropyl)silane, Trimethoxy(3-glycidyloxypropyl)silane, γ-(2,3-Epoxypropoxy)propyltrimethoxysilane, γ-Glycidyl ether propyltrimethoxysilane, γ-Triglycidoxypropyltrimethoxysilane

data.description: Dynasylan® GLYMO is a bifunctional organosilane, featuring a reactive organic epoxide and hydrolyzable inorganic methoxysilyl groups. This dual reactivity empowers Dynasylan® GLYMO to chemically bond with both inorganic materials (e.g., glass, metals, fillers) and organic polymers (such as thermosets, thermoplastics, elastomers). It functions as an adhesion promoter, crosslinking agent, and surface modifier.

data.name: Dynasylan® HYDROSIL 1151
data.description: Dynasylan® HYDROSIL 1151 is the ultimate adhesion promoter and surface modifier. Tailored for enhancing bonding between glass and metal, this silane is a game-changer for various applications. Whether in primers, foundry resins, or abrasives, it delivers. With benefits like improved strength, corrosion resistance, and high performance, Dynasylan® HYDROSIL 1151 takes your materials to the next level.

data.name: Dynasylan® HYDROSIL 1153
data.description: Dynasylan® HYDROSIL 1153 is the ultimate adhesion promoter and surface modifier. Tailored for enhancing bonding between glass and metal, this silane is a game-changer for various applications. Whether in primers, foundry resins, or abrasives, it delivers. With benefits like improved strength, corrosion resistance, and high performance, Dynasylan® HYDROSIL 1153 takes your materials to the next level.

data.name: Dynasylan® HYDROSIL 2627
data.description: Dynasylan® HYDROSIL 2627 is an innovative surface modifier and crosslinking agent that transforms materials. Designed for glass and metal substrates, this VOC-free organosilane enhances adhesion and coupling. With a liquid water carrier, it ensures excellent processability. From cables to laminates, Dynasylan® HYDROSIL 2627 revolutionizes your plastics and elastomers with its versatile benefits.

data.name: Dynasylan® HYDROSIL 2776
data.description: Dynasylan® HYDROSIL 2776 is an advanced organosilane that transforms surfaces. As a versatile surface modifier and crosslinking agent, it excels in various applications. With its VOC-free composition, it enhances adhesion and coupling. This product is a game-changer for building materials, electrical components, and elastomers. Experience improved processability and exceptional performance in cables, laminates, and pipes with Dynasylan® HYDROSIL 2776.

data.name: Dynasylan® HYDROSIL 2926
data.description: Dynasylan® HYDROSIL 2926 is a versatile organosilane solution designed to enhance various applications. This water-based product acts as a surface modifier, crosslinking agent, and adhesion promoter. It effectively works with polymers like Polyethylenes (PE), Polypropylenes (PP), Epoxies (EP), and more. Meeting regulatory standards such as REACH Exempt, this liquid solution is available in cans and drums. Trust in its high performance and compatibility for improved results.

data.name: Dynasylan® MEMO

summary.name: Synonyms
items: (3-Methacryloxypropyl)trimethoxysilane, (γ-Methacryloxypropyl)trimethoxysilane, [γ-(Methacryloyloxy)propyl]trimethoxysilane, 2-Methyl-2-propenoic acid 3-(trimethoxysilyl)propyl ester, 3-(Methylacryloxy)propyltrimethoxysilane, 3-(Trimethoxysilyl)propyl methacrylate, 3-(Trimethyoxysilyl)propyl methacrylate, 3-Methacryloxypropyltrimethoxisilane, 3-Methacryloyloxypropyltrimethoxysilane, 3-Trimethoxysilylpropyl 2-methylprop-2-enoate, Methacryloyloxypropyltrimethoxysilane, NSC 93591, Trimethoxy(3-methacryloxypropyl)silane, Trimethoxy(3-methacryloyloxypropyl)silane, γ-Methacryloxy propyl trimethoxyl silane

data.description: Dynasylan® MEMO is a revolutionary solution for enhancing polymer and resin performance. As a versatile surface modifier and coupling agent, it excels in various applications. This product boasts exceptional chemical resistance, improving filler dispersion and mechanical properties in plastics and elastomers. With features like acid and alkali resistance, low viscosity, and good wet adhesion strength, Dynasylan® MEMO transforms materials into high-performance wonders. Experience its benefits in cables, pipes, and more.

data.name: Dynasylan® MTES
data.description: Dynasylan® MTES is an alkyltrialkoxysilane, plays a vital role in sol-gel systems. It appears as a colorless, low-viscosity liquid. Utilization involves hydrolysis catalyzed by acid or alkali. As a trifunctional compound, all three alkoxy groups partake in this reaction, enriched by the added organic character from the methyl group. Hydrolysis generates silanol groups that subsequently form highly stable siloxane bonds (-Si-O-Si-) through condensation. This parallel process occurs after a certain amount of silanol groups emerge. The pace of hydrolysis and condensation depends on pH, concentration, solvent, temperature, and the catalyst.

data.name: Dynasylan® MTMO
data.description: Dynasylan® MTMO is a bifunctional organosilane, featuring a reactive organic mercapto and a hydrolyzable inorganic methoxysilyl group. Its versatile reactivity enables chemical bonding to both inorganic materials (e.g., glass, metals, fillers) and organic polymers (such as thermosets, thermoplastics, elastomers). Serving as an adhesion promoter, crosslinking agent, surface modifier, or reactive reagent, Dynasylan® MTMO offers multifaceted functionality.

data.name: Dynasylan® MTMS

summary.name: Synonyms
items: (Trimethoxysilyl)methane, Methylsilicon trimethoxide (MeSi(OMe)3), Methyltrimethoxysilane, Methyltrimethyloxysilane, MTMS, NSC 93883, Trimethoxymethylsilane

data.description: Dynasylan® MTMS is an alkyltrialkoxysilane, holds a pivotal role in sol-gel systems. It appears as a colorless, low-viscosity liquid. Notably trifunctional, all three alkoxy groups possess hydrolytic capability, while the methyl group introduces organic character. Hydrolysis instigates the formation of silanol groups, which subsequently engage in condensation reactions to establish robust siloxane bonds (-Si-O-Si-). This condensation process coincides with hydrolysis after a threshold of silanol groups emerges. Hydrolysis and condensation rates depend on pH, concentration, solvent, temperature, and the catalyst.

data.name: Dynasylan® P
data.description: Dynasylan® P is a special silicic acid ester. It is mainly used as crosslinker in the silicone industry. Dynasylan® P can be further used as precursor for inorganic binders and as basic ingredient in sol-gel formulations. It's trusted across the globe, compliant with certifications like REACH and various chemical inventories. Available in drums and totes, it finds its application in sol-gel coatings, effectively working with silicones. Elevate your coatings with Dynasylan® P.

data.name: Dynasylan® PTMO
data.description: Dynasylan® PTMO exhibits trifunctional behavior as all three alkoxy groups can hydrolyze. This compound also features a propyl group that imparts hydrophobic attributes to sol-gel coatings. Hydrolysis initiates silanol group formation, leading to subsequent condensation reactions that yield stable siloxane bonds (-Si-O-Si-). Condensation progresses alongside hydrolysis, provided a certain amount of silanol groups are present. The speed and ratio of hydrolysis and condensation hinge on factors like pH, concentration, solvent, temperature, and catalyst.

data.name: Dynasylan® SILBOND® 40
data.description: Dynasylan® SILBOND® 40 is an ethyl polysilicate, emerges from partial hydrolysis of tetraethyl orthosilicate (TEOS). This transformation converts ethoxy groups into hydroxyl groups, generating silanols. Subsequent condensation of silanols engenders siloxane bonds (-Si-O-Si-O-) and prompts eventual gelation. Often deployed as an intermediary, Dynasylan® SILBOND® 40 undergoes further hydrolysis to produce a binder suitable for diverse applications. These include inorganic zinc-rich primers, investment casting molds, ceramic shapes, coatings, and thermal insulation.

data.name: Dynasylan® SILBOND® Condensed

summary.name: Synonyms
items: Ethyl Orthosilicate, Ethyl Silicate, Tetraethoxysilane, Tetraethyl Silicate

data.description: Dynasylan® SILBOND® Condensed serves as a raw material composed of tetraethyl orthosilicate (TEOS; Si[OEt]4 ). This substance is utilized for acid- or alkali-catalyzed hydrolysis and subsequent condensation reactions, commonly known as the sol-gel process. The rate of gelation is influenced by the concentration of water and the pH.

data.name: Dynasylan® SILBOND® HT-28A
data.description: Dynasylan® SILBOND® HT-28A is a milky-white, low-viscosity pre-hydrolyzed ethyl polysilicate hybrid binder, boasting a silica content ranging from 32.5 to 33.5% (as SiO2 ). This silica content arises from a blend of TEOS-derived silica and other components. This formulation is tailored for use in two-component inorganic zinc-rich primers. The product brings forth enhanced toughness and exceptional performance in high-temperature scenarios. The heightened toughness results directly from the increased silica content in contrast to an ethyl polysilicate binder.

data.name: Dynasylan® SILBOND® HT-33
data.description: Dynasylan® SILBOND® HT-33 is a milky-white, low-viscosity pre-hydrolyzed ethyl polysilicate hybrid binder, boasts a silica content ranging from 32.7% to 34.0% (as SiO2). Formulated for two-component inorganic zinc-rich primers, this material brings about improved toughness and exceptional performance in high-temperature applications. The elevated SiO2 content directly contributes to its enhanced toughness.

data.name: Dynasylan® SIVO 110
data.description: Dynasylan® SIVO 110 stands as a versatile, virtually VOC-free, water-borne sol-gel system. It integrates organofunctional silanes with nanoscale SiO2 particles. This product, available as an opaque to milky, colorless to slightly yellow, low-viscosity liquid, can be diluted in water and common organic solvents. Dynasylan® SIVO 110 features reactive silanol groups and Si-bonded epoxy-based organic functionalities.

data.name: Dynasylan® SIVO 160
data.description: Dynasylan® SIVO 160 presents a water-borne, storage-stable silane-based sol-gel system engineered for formulating inorganic surface treatment primers. A part of the SIVO® SOL Technology, it inherits the benefits of its established series counterparts by excluding heavy metals, fluorides, and solvents. Designed for minimal volatile organic content, its polymeric nature endows it with high reactivity. This is highlighted by its remarkably low curing temperature range of 20 to 80 °C, a significant advancement for water-borne sol-gel systems. Dynasylan® SIVO 160, appearing as a clear to slightly opaque, colorless to slightly yellow, low-viscosity liquid, offers versatile utility.

data.name: Dynasylan® SIVO 202
data.description: Dynasylan® SIVO 202 is a versatile aminosilane adhesion promoter, finds application in a diverse range of uses. Particularly suited for adhesives and sealants, it elevates the adhesion of hybrid products (e.g., silylated polyurethanes, MS Polymers), RTV-silicones, two-part polyurethanes, and two-part epoxies to inorganic surfaces and challenging plastic surfaces. Additionally, Dynasylan® SIVO 202 accelerates sealant curing, yields highly crosslinked products, and imparts both increased flexibility and hydrophobicity.

data.name: Dynasylan® SIVO 203
data.description: Dynasylan® SIVO 203 is another multifunctional aminosilane adhesion promoter, is equally versatile for an array of applications. Designed mainly for adhesives and sealants, it enhances the adhesion of hybrid products (e.g., silylated polyurethanes, MS Polymers), RTV-silicones, two-part polyurethanes, and two-part epoxies to inorganic surfaces and select challenging plastic surfaces. In addition, Dynasylan® SIVO 203 accelerates sealant curing, fosters high crosslinked product formation, and imparts both heightened flexibility and hydrophobicity.

data.name: Dynasylan® SIVO 214
data.description: Dynasylan® SIVO 214 is an aminofunctional silane composition with enhanced crosslinking activity. It serves as an adhesion promoter, facilitating bonding between inorganic materials (such as glass, metals, fillers) and organic polymers (including thermosets, thermoplastics, elastomers). Additionally, it functions as a surface modifier and supports chemical modification of various substances.

data.name: Evonik
data.description:
Our purpose is the cornerstone of our performance pledge: “Leading beyond chemistry to improve life, today and tomorrow.” It can be traced back to our company’s roots and describes why we do something, what drives us and the contribution Evonik makes to society over and above generating profits.

At Evonik, we go beyond chemistry to make life a little better day in, day out – a goal we are committed to. We aim to have a direct, positive impact on everyone’s life by enhancing the properties of our customers’ products. Our purpose is hence the driving force behind our strategic decisions, through which we naturally take responsibility for the present and future generations.

HOME_PAGE.TITLE: Chemicals Marketplace - ingredients & raw materials - Knowde

EXPERTS.HEADING: Message Our Experts For a Fast Response

HOME_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: Knowde is the first marketplace for chemicals, polymers and ingredients. Our leading-edge digital capabilities connect thousands of suppliers and customers every day.

UNILEVER.QUOTE_CONTENT: Knowde is especially helping us with newer, smaller but up-and-coming suppliers that are useful to have on our radar especially in the field of Sustainability.

CURIO.QUOTE_CONTENT: Purchasing ingredients should always be this easy!

BEAUTY.TITLE: Beauty by Lubrizol Life Science
BEAUTY.DESCRIPTION: LLS partners with customers to develop, manufacture and market a broad range of differentiated ingredients for skin care, hair care and skin cleansing.

PEAS.TITLE: Plant Proteins by Roquette
PEAS.DESCRIPTION: The products made with NUTRALYS® don't just nourish us today – they help us feed ourselves tomorrow too. Together, we are changing how the planet eats.

WHY_KNOWDE.HEADING: Interact with over 8,000 suppliers, browse their catalogs, access documents and download starter formulations.

SECTION_1.HEADING: Instant access to the most comprehensive product catalog
SECTION_1.DESCRIPTION: Browse, search and filter the world's largest catalog of chemicals, ingredients and polymers.

SECTION_2.HEADING: Talk directly to suppliers' experts
SECTION_2.DESCRIPTION: Ask technical product questions, talk to a sales rep and inquire about pricing.

SECTION_3.HEADING: Order samples, request documents, and get quotes
SECTION_3.DESCRIPTION: Knowde concierge will handle all the details and ensure your requests are handled faster than ever.

WHY_CHEMISTRY.HEADING: Driving the world's most impactful industry forward.

SECTION_1.DESCRIPTION: At Knowde, we believe in the power of chemistry. We believe that easy and efficient access to information and raw materials enables you to work smarter and faster so you can continue to make a rich global impact.

SECTION_2.DESCRIPTION: Your innovations have decreased the carbon footprint of the automotive industry, imagined a sustainable agricultural future, developed alternative, biodegradable packaging materials, and changed the landscape of connectivity forever – to name a few. This is only the beginning.
SECTION_2.HEADING: We can't wait to see what you create with Knowde.

ERROR_MESSAGE.PASSWORD_RULES_PATTERN: Password Must contain 8 or more characters. Must contain a digit. Must contain a lower case character. Must contain an upper case character. Must contain a special character
ERROR_MESSAGE.PASSWORD_RULES_MIN_LENGTH: Password is too short (minimum is 8 characters)
ERROR_MESSAGE.VALUE_GRATER_THAN_ZERO: Value needs to be greater than zero.
ERROR_MESSAGE.MAX_CHARACTERS_LIMIT: Value must be {charactersLimit} characters or less.
ERROR_MESSAGE.REQUIRED_AUTH_FIELD: Please provide information for the above field.

REDIRECT_TO_KNOWDE.HEADING: You’re being taken to Knowde to manage your requests with ease
REDIRECT_TO_KNOWDE.PARAGRAPH: Knowde is {companyName}’s tool for managing all of your sample & document requests, RFQs, orders, and more in one place.

KNOWDE_WELCOME.HEADING: Welcome to Knowde!
KNOWDE_WELCOME.DESCRIPTION: Knowde is the world’s biggest marketplace to search for ingredients, polymers, and chemistry.  You can:

ADVANTAGES.SEARCH: Search & filter for chemicals by thousands of attributes

POWERBOX.ITEM_ADDED_TO_CART: The item was added to your cart

INSTANT_QUOTE.ENTER_THE_DETAILS_TO_CALCULATE_PRICE: Enter the details needed to calculate the best price
INSTANT_QUOTE.REQUEST_CUSTOM_QUOTE_INSTEAD_COPY: Based on your volume and delivery location we require additional info and contact details so we can best meet your needs
INSTANT_QUOTE.COMPANY_IS_PLEASED_TO_OFFER_FOLLOWING: {company} is pleased to offer flexible terms and pricing. You have qualified for multiple offers for
INSTANT_QUOTE.INSTANT_QUOTE_IS_READY_INSTRUCTIONS: Select the SKU you need, edit your quantity, then Add to Cart to begin the checkout process.

COMPLETENESS_SCORE_BANNER.MAIN_TEXT: Set up your storefront to attract buyers

404.TITLE: Page not found - Store for chemicals, polymers and ingredients
404.DESCRIPTION: That’s not the reaction we were expecting.

500.TITLE: Internal Server Error - Store for chemicals, polymers and ingredients
500.DESCRIPTION: That’s not the reaction we were expecting.

CLIENT_EXCEPTION.TITLE: Client Side Exception - Store for chemicals, polymers and ingredients
CLIENT_EXCEPTION.DESCRIPTION: Unexpected error occurred. Please contact us.

VOLUME_DESCRIPTION.HEADING: Expected Annual Volume
VOLUME_DESCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION: The quantity your business will require annually, if the sample product suits your project's needs.

REQUEST_RECOMMENDATIONS.TITLE: Add Similar Products
REQUEST_RECOMMENDATIONS.DESCRIPTION: Based on your previous request, you may be interested in these products

PURCHASE_ORDER.TITLE: Purchase Order
PURCHASE_ORDER.NOTE: If you have a purchase order number, you can add it now.
PURCHASE_ORDER.TAX_NOTE: Taxes & Shipping are calculated in the next step.

ACTIVE_QUOTES.EXPIRES_IN_DAYS: Expires in {expiresInDays, plural, one {1 day} other {# days}}

CONCIERGE.TITLE: CONCIERGE ONLY
CONCIERGE.SUBTITLE: Place an Order on behalf of any Buyer by specifying the Buyer's email. The Buyer must have active Quotes already available for these products.

SELLER_ARRANGED.TITLE: Seller-Arranged Shipping
SELLER_ARRANGED.DESCRIPTION: The seller is responsible for contracting a carrier and shipping the product to their facilities.

BUYER_ARRANGED.TITLE: Buyer-Arranged Shipping
BUYER_ARRANGED.DESCRIPTION: The buyer is responsible for contracting a carrier and shipping the product to their facilities.

DELIVERY.SUBHEADING: The location where the contracted carrier will be delivering the order to.

SHIPPING.SUBHEADING: The location that is the last stopping point for your shipment.
SHIPPING.CHECKBOX_TITLE: Final Destination same as Delivery Address

MISSING_PROVIDER.TITLE: A rate quote could not be retrieved.
MISSING_PROVIDER.MESSAGE: Knowde will provide a rate within 24 hours, once you place your order.

SPECIAL_INSTRUCTIONS.TITLE: Special Instructions
SPECIAL_INSTRUCTIONS.PLACEHOLDER: Add any additional information about your order here.

DELETE.TITLE: Remove card
DELETE.DESCRIPTION: Clicking the "Remove" button will permanently delete the card

KNOWDE_PAY.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: A flexible payment service powered by Knowde.
KNOWDE_PAY.LONG_DESCRIPTION: Now you can quickly transact online and avoid the hassle of establishing a new line of credit. Knowde will issue invoices and collect payments on behalf of the Supplier.

OFFLINE_PAYMENT.SUBHEADER: {companyName} will invoice your account off platform.

TAX_EXEMPTION.TITLE: Tax Exemption
TAX_EXEMPTION.LABEL: Cart items are tax-exempt
TAX_EXEMPTION.NOTE: Unchecking this will apply sales and use tax to all cart items

SUMMARY.NOTE: You will only be charged once your order ships.

ORDER.TITLE: Order
ORDER.SUBTITLE: An order receipt has been emailed to {email}
ORDER.NOTE: Check order status, print a PDF, or get tracking information at any time within your

ERRORS.SHIPPING_TITLE: Please fix the following before proceeding to payment

MULTIPLE_SUPPLIERS.TITLE: You have items from multiple suppliers in your cart
MULTIPLE_SUPPLIERS.MESSAGE: Please ensure all items are from the same supplier before proceeding to checkout.

CONFLICTING_INCOTERMS.TITLE: Items in your cart have conflicting Incoterms.
CONFLICTING_INCOTERMS.MESSAGE: Please remove any items until all Incoterms match.

ITEM_EXPIRED.TITLE: The quote for this line item has expired, please request a new quote from the seller.

BILLING_ADDRESS.TITLE: A Billing Address is required
BILLING_ADDRESS.MISSING_EMAIL: The selected address needs a billing email. Please edit and save again.

TERMS.TITLE: You must agree to the Ecommerce Terms & Conditions.

CURRENCY_MISMATCH.TITLE: Your Cart can only contain products with the same currency. Products with different currencies are moved to Saved for Later

ITEM_QUANTITY_LESS_THAN_MOQ.TITLE: You have entered a package quantity less than the Minimum Order Quantity.
ITEM_QUANTITY_LESS_THAN_MOQ.MESSAGE: The seller may not fulfill production at this level.

ITEM_QUANTITY_MORE_THAN_MAX_QUANTITY.TITLE: You have entered a package quantity more than the Maximum Order Quantity.
ITEM_QUANTITY_MORE_THAN_MAX_QUANTITY.MESSAGE: The seller may not fulfill production at this level.

ITEM_NEARLY_EXPIRED.TITLE: The quote for this line item will expire in less than a month.
ITEM_NEARLY_EXPIRED.MESSAGE: Please order before Quote Expiry Date.

PAGE_MOBILE.TITLE: This feature is currently unavailable at this screen size.
PAGE_MOBILE.DESCRIPTION: Please use a desktop or larger display.

CALENDLY.SKIP_BUTTON: Skip, I’m not interested in a demo right now

WEEKLY_WEBINAR.TITLE: Weekly Webinar
WEEKLY_WEBINAR.SUBTITLE_FIRST: Learn how you can make the most of the free tools now available to you.
WEEKLY_WEBINAR.SUBTITLE_SECOND: Explore the capabilities of the platform with our dedicated team.

STRATEGIC_BUYER.TITLE: Schedule a Demo

REVENUE_LIMIT.SUBTITLE_SECOND: Explore the capabilities of the platform and get immediate assistance for your needs with one of our experts.

PREVIEW_BADGE.PRODUCT_IN_PREVIEW: This product is in preview mode. It is not currently live on the Knowde Marketplace.

EXPERTS_PAGE.TITLE: {companyName} experts - Knowde
EXPERTS_PAGE.WE_CAN_GUIDE_YOU: We can guide you to the best product for your application and answer any questions.

FLAVOR_ANALYZER.HEADER: Need a flavor that’s not in our online PRIMETIME catalog?
FLAVOR_ANALYZER.DISCOVER_FLAVORS: Tap into our expansive offline portfolio of over 500,000 flavors! Our Portfolio Team can assist in identifying the perfect flavor for your needs. Tell us more about what you’re looking for.
FLAVOR_ANALYZER.ORDER_LIMITS: (** Minimum order quantities may apply and exceed standard PRIMETIME Flavors minimum orders. Certain applications excluded.)

PAYWALL.TITLE_1: Get new products to market faster with a free Knowde Marketplace account
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_1: Gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers from 8,000 suppliers. Browse, search, and filter to quickly compare products, find information, request documents, order samples, and get quotes directly from suppliers.
PAYWALL.TITLE_2: The fastest way to find the right raw materials for your products
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_2: Search and filter over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers, access documents and download starter formulations. Interact with over 8,000 suppliers whose representatives are ready to help. Sign up for a free Knowde Marketplace account today.
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_3: Create a free account to gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 products and their documents.
